songs.title: Whether You Like It Or Not [Snippet]
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
It's the King, bitch!
Aight, niggas, time to getcha weight up!
Catch up or keep up, sucka nigga!
King Back, nigga! As if I went somewhere!

[Verse]
Have you bumped your head? Is you out your mind?
Thinking I'm gon' play dead, and I won't shine
Homie I don't lose, even when I ain't tryin'
Start spreading the news, shawty, cause I ain't dying
Don't be frontin' for nothin', cousin, 'cause I ain't lyin'
I'm too far in the front, and you steady falling behind
Just a friendly reminder to you, in case you forgot
I'm at the top of the pile, whether you like it or not
Whether you like it or not
You looking at a head case with a fed case
Got rid of all the AKs, they were dead weight

[Echo to fade]
